title: Copyright Lawyer / Legal Advice
content:
Hi  
I was hoping someone could recommend a lawyer that might be good for typeface copyright questions? In New York City.

Thanks,  
Erik

(A search of the forum found one recommendation, but from 2006)
author: ErikSyrup

comments.content:
Frank Martinez  
Martinez Group PLLC  
55 Washington Street, Suite 323  
Brooklyn, NY 11201
